page.title: 15Pupils at School in Chobham
page.content: The youngest{boy}at Wishmore is ten the oldest is seventeen. There have been no changes in two years apart from the numbers of children have increased.{School}starts at 9.15am and ends at 4.00pm.{Bedtime}is at 9.00pm. There are 6 to 7 children in each {class.}The range of{subjects}is smaller than a normal school. They do five sports, football, cricket, volleyball, tabletennis and tennis but there is no sports day. Activities in the{evening}are cookery, football, board games and walks. The boys have an hour's{homework}every night. The boys are allowed to bring {pets}to school, like a mouse, a rat or a gerbil. They only have{exams}in their final year.
